OOC: Minime as funny as that sounds, wed totally screw history.  Too bad on 
the Bob Skir thing though.  hey, the Mets played alright too.  But i am a 
Yankee fan! As i said to console my uncle(an insane Met fan), 'Its not 
weather you win or lose its how you play game'.  ITS JUST A GAME GUYS!
